articles.author: Salon
articles.title: Trump's Bibles get the "SNL" treatment
articles.description: "Saturday Night Live" skewers Trump ahead of Easter Sunday
articles.content:
James Austin Johnson donned the blond hair, blue suit and red tie to play Donald Trump on "Saturday Night Live," before busting out an "exclusive" Trump Bible.
The Easter Sunday eve episode featured the Trump Bible sketch in its cold open.
"Basically... [678 chars]

articles.title: Trump attacks resigning GOP Reps as ‘cowards and weaklings’ as majority thins
articles.description: Former President Trump went after the flurry of GOP House members leaving their seats this year, throwing the already razor-thin Republican majority up in the air. “Never forget our cowards and weaklings! Such a disgrace,” Trump said in a Truth Social post on Sunday in response to an article about outgoing Rep. Mike Gallagher (R-Wis.).…

articles.author: Sky News
articles.title: Joe Biden criticised by Trump campaign for declaring Transgender Day of Visibility on Easter Sunday
articles.description: The day celebrating the transgender community falls on 31 March annually, but critics of the Democratic president have condemned his decision to declare it on the same day this year knowing it coincides with Easter Sunday.
articles.content:
